title: Pixel 2 XL power button malfunction
content:
Hi! I've got a 12 month old Pixel 2 XL with malfunctioning power button.

The error started occurring during the last weeks. At first, the phone quick opened the camera when I single pressed the power button. This happened both when indending to lock the phone or wake the screen. Quick launching the camera normally requires a douple press on the power button.

The error occurs at least hourly / every other time I press the button.

Yesterday I reset the phone to factory standards by deleting everything. After doing this, I was unable to reproduce the malfunction for several hours - the phone worked well. After installing all apps and updates, the malfunction started again.

I'm not 100% sure it's not an hardware error, but I suspect it's software, since the reset seemed to fix the problem. Does anybody know a solution or if it's an known error pending an update?
